Class GmmlColor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--GmmlColor
public class GmmlColor
extends java.lang.Object

This class takes care of colors given as a string-gmml format. This can contain hex, integer or string color data. This class is a helper to sort this out and get the propper color data out of the string. TODO add something to find and use int colors! This is not supported atm!

Constructor Summary
GmmlColor()
          Create an empty GmmlColor
GmmlColor(java.lang.String colorstring)
          Create a new GmmlColor and store the color in it, note that if the string is an invalid gmml color string it will result in black.
 
Method Summary
static java.lang.String convertColorToString(java.awt.Color color)
          Convert an awt Color object into a valid hex string for storing in files
static java.awt.Color convertStringToColor(java.lang.String colorstring)
          Convert a gmml valid color string into a Color awt can use
static float[] convertStringToFloat(java.lang.String colorstring)
          Convert a gmml valid color string into a float[3]
 java.awt.Color getColor()
          This method returns a Color that awt can use
 float[] getColorFloat()
          This method returns a color in the format of a float[3] with r,g,b stored in it.
 void storeColor(java.lang.String colorstring)
          Store a gmml valid color string
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
